description: Uses govc command line to do custom deployments of CNC. This can optionally just generate the command without executing.
name: CNC - Single Node (1 nic) v2 GOVC Version

options.description:
Execute command or just generate it.
- Generate (default) Show the command line that needs to be run, but the user
- Execute - Generate the command line and run it on the local system
options.label: Deployment Option
options.name: Option

options.description: - If exists, destory and create new
options.label: Overwrite Existing
options.name: overwrite

options.description: `True` if this is first node, `False` for all other nodes
options.label: Seed Node?
options.name: seed-node

options.description: > `1` is used for an all-in-one single VM, otherwise `3`
options.label: Initial Node Count
options.name: initial-node-count

options.description: > `1` is used for an all-in-one single VM, otherwise `3`
options.label: Initial Master Count
options.name: initial-master-count

options.description:
- thin - lab only, meaning disk is thin provisioned
- thick - production, meaning disk is fully allocated before usage
options.label: Virtual Disk Mode
options.name: disk-mode

options.description:
- IPv4 Network (2 vNIC)
- IPv4 Network on a Single Interface (1 vNIC) - LAB only.
> /opt/cw/options/cw-deployment-option.json
options.label: Deployment Type
options.name: deployment-option

options.description:
DNS Domain name as defined in DNS. This should be pre-existing
> [Create new](678c8725-fd1d-4849-b7dd-787aa192563a) | [Show existing]()
options.label: Domain Name
options.name: domain-name

options.description: > Info to populate in the annotation field
options.label: Annotation in vCenter
options.name: annotation

options.description:
If present, it must be existing and resolvable. Otherwise keep blank to use by IP
> If it does not exist then the deployment will fail.
options.label: Controller IP DNS Name
options.name: controller-vip-name

options.description:
If present, it must be existing and resolvable. Otherwise keep blank to use by IP
> If it does not exist then the deployment will fail.
options.label: Data VIP DNS Name
options.name: data-vip-name

options.description:
[Add DNS Server](678c8725-fd1d-4849-b7dd-787aa192563a) | [Remove DNS Server](e206dab8-cf07-459a-accd-37156c9537d6)
- Select `new value` to add entry 
> /opt/cw/options/dns-servers.json
options.label: DNS Server
options.name: dns-server

options.description:
***Dynamic*** - IP Addressing from Netbox
***Static*** - IP Addressing entered by user
options.label: Network Options for Management Network
options.name: vnic-0-static

configuration.command: bash -c 'if [ "${option.vnic-0-static}" == "static" ]; then echo ${option.vnic-0-ip},${option.vnic-0-mask},${option.vnic-0-gateway}; else false; fi'
bash -c 'if [ "${option.vnic-0-static}" != "static" ]; then echo "255.255.255.0"; else true; fi'
bash -c 'if [ "${option.vmware-esx-host}" == "-ESXHOST-" ]; then echo ""; else echo "${option.vmware-esx-host}"; fi'

commands.description: Set host type - ESX or vCenter

commands.script:
export GOVC_URL=@option.vcenter-host@ 
export GOVC_USERNAME=@option.vcenter-username@ 
export GOVC_PASSWORD=@option.vcenter-password@ 
export GOVC_INSECURE=1 

# Delete the extra AWS params
spec=$(govc import.spec "@export.cnc-image@" | jq -c '.PropertyMapping[] |= del(select(.Key|test("^NBI.")))') 

# Property Mappings
changed=$(echo $spec | jq -c '( .PropertyMapping[]|select(.Key=="ManagementIPv4Address") ).Value|= "@data.nic-0-ip*@@export.ip-1@"') 
changed=$(echo $changed | jq -c '( .PropertyMapping[]|select(.Key=="ManagementIPv4Netmask") ).Value|= "@data.nic-0-mask*@"') 
changed=$(echo $changed | jq -c '( .PropertyMapping[]|select(.Key=="ManagementIPv4Gateway") ).Value|= "@data.nic-0-gw*@@export.gw-1@"') 
changed=$(echo $changed | jq -c '( .PropertyMapping[]|select(.Key=="CWUsername") ).Value|= "cw-admin"') 
changed=$(echo $changed | jq -c '( .PropertyMapping[]|select(.Key=="CWPassword") ).Value|= "@option.cw-admin-password@"') 
changed=$(echo $changed | jq -c '( .PropertyMapping[]|select(.Key=="Timezone") ).Value|= "@option.timzone*@"') 
changed=$(echo $changed | jq -c '( .PropertyMapping[]|select(.Key=="DNSv4") ).Value|= "@data.dns-servers*@"') 
changed=$(echo $changed | jq -c '( .PropertyMapping[]|select(.Key=="NTP") ).Value|= "@data.ntp-servers*@"') 
changed=$(echo $changed | jq -c '( .PropertyMapping[]|select(.Key=="Domain") ).Value|= "@option.domain-name@"') 
changed=$(echo $changed | jq -c '( .PropertyMapping[]|select(.Key=="ramdisk") ).Value|= "@option.ramdisk@"') 
changed=$(echo $changed | jq -c '( .PropertyMapping[]|select(.Key=="bckup_min_percent") ).Value|= "@option.backup-percentage@"') 
changed=$(echo $changed | jq -c '( .PropertyMapping[]|select(.Key=="Disclaimer") ).Value|= "@option.disclaimer@"') 
changed=$(echo $changed | jq -c '( .PropertyMapping[]|select(.Key=="VMType") ).Value|= "@option.node-type@"') 
changed=$(echo $changed | jq -c '( .PropertyMapping[]|select(.Key=="IsSeed") ).Value|= "@option.seed-node@"') 
changed=$(echo $changed | jq -c '( .PropertyMapping[]|select(.Key=="ManagementVIP") ).Value|= "@export.mgtvip@"') 
changed=$(echo $changed | jq -c '( .PropertyMapping[]|select(.Key=="ManagementVIPName") ).Value|= "@export.mgtdns@"') 
changed=$(echo $changed | jq -c '( .PropertyMapping[]|select(.Key=="DataVIP") ).Value|= "@export.datavip@"') 
changed=$(echo $changed | jq -c '( .PropertyMapping[]|select(.Key=="DataVIPName") ).Value|= "@export.datadns@"') 
changed=$(echo $changed | jq -c '( .PropertyMapping[]|select(.Key=="CwInstaller") ).Value|= "False"') 
changed=$(echo $changed | jq -c '( .PropertyMapping[]|select(.Key=="InitNodeCount") ).Value|= "@option.initial-node-count@"') 
changed=$(echo $changed | jq -c '( .PropertyMapping[]|select(.Key=="InitMasterCount") ).Value|= "@option.initial-master-count@"') 

# Remove mappings not required, just in case
#changed=$(echo $changed | jq -c 'del(.PropertyMapping[]|select(.Key?|startswith("Admin","NBI","Aws"))) | del(.NetworkMapping[]|select(.Name?|startswith("Admin","NBI")))') 

# Network Mapping Properties
changed=$(echo $changed | jq -c '( .NetworkMapping[]|select(.Name=="Management Network") ).Network|= "@data.vnic-1-network*@"') 

# General Properties thin
changed=$(echo $changed | jq -c '.DiskProvisioning="@option.disk-mode@"') 
changed=$(echo $changed | jq -c '.Deployment="@option.deployment-option@"') 
changed=$(echo $changed | jq -c '.IPAllocationPolicy="fixedPolicy"') 
changed=$(echo $changed | jq -c '.Annotation="@option.annotation@"') 
changed=$(echo $changed | jq -c '.InjectOvfEnv=true') 
changed=$(echo $changed | jq -c '.Name="@data.host-name*@"') 
echo $changed 
echo $changed > /opt/cw/tmp/@job.execid@

esxhost=$(basename @data.esx-host*@ )

echo govc import.ova -ds='"'@data.datastore*@'"' -host='"'$esxhost'"' -name='"'@data.host-name*@'"' -options='"'/opt/cw/tmp/@job.execid@'"' '"'@export.cnc-image@'"'

configuration.command: bash -c 'if [ "${option.Option}" == "Execute" ]; then false; else true; fi'

commands.description: If option is Execute, then run the command

errorhandler.script:
export GOVC_URL=@option.vcenter-host@ 
export GOVC_USERNAME=@option.vcenter-username@ 
export GOVC_PASSWORD=@option.vcenter-password@ 
export GOVC_INSECURE=1 

if [ "@option.overwrite@" == "true" ]
then
    echo Destroying existing VM
    govc vm.destroy "@option.host-name@"
fi

env
echo @data.command-line*@
@data.command-line*@
govc vm.change -vm "@data.host-name*@" -c=@option.deployment-size-cpu@ -m=@option.deployment-size-mem@
govc vm.change -vm "@data.host-name*@" -annotation "Deployed by rundeck job: @job.execid@. Image file:@export.cnc-image@"
govc vm.power -on "@data.host-name*@"

commands.description: Find the POD name from IP
